name: Tank vs Pirates
description:
This game is built by only one Person.This game was made for Kenney Jam.

All the Assets used in this game are from kenney and Sound from freesound.org

How-To-Play:

-You have to control both the tank and missile.

-You can have only one active missile at a time

-A and D for rotation of tank and Missile

-Left Click  or Space for Fire

-S or Right Click to explode missile immediately
